reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 21, 2023
reviews.reviewText: Love these headphones!!! My kids go thru at least two pairs every year in school and need a new pair for home too! So buying a whole box is super convenient!!! They seem quite durable and the sound is good.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on March 19, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars Very Stylish, Very Good BUT….
reviews.reviewText: If you are getting these for classroom use. They are good quality headphones. Cost a lot from my own pocket, but you’ve gotta do what you’ve got do.If you are a TEACHER who teaches young children please train the kids on how to use them, and remind them OFTEN! These will break easily in the process of young kids folding the headphones 😭😭 About seven of them are broken in a matter of 2 months because the kids are breaking them when they bend them. Teach the kids how to handle them gently OR make it a class job and designate a few trustworthy students to collect them, fold them, and put them away.Update: They didn’t make it to the end of the year. Like another person mentioned, there’s a design flaw that causes them to break at the area that you fold them. All of them were broken this way.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on May 5, 2023
reviews.reviewText: I purchased these headphones as extras in my classroom. They work great for sound quality and the students enjoy the ear covers - very soft and comfy. Only complaint is that a few have broken from my students pulling them apart too far taking them on and off. But I have 2nd graders… so I can’t really blame the headphones.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on June 6, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Cool headphones for a small classroom set.
reviews.reviewText: Headphones are vibrant in colors. It’s nice to have two sets of colors. It’s a total of 10 headphones, which comes down to $10 each. Affordable for personal use or for a small classroom set.I would have preferred to have a set of 20 but it’s too expensive for a teacher to purchase on his/her/they own. Overall, I’m happy with my purchase.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 25, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars Not working very well.
reviews.reviewText: Sound issues (may be wiring) and they band is breaking easily.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on March 17, 2023
reviews.reviewText: Bought these for my students and they all broke in the same spot. The part where they fold up for storage. I guess you get what you pay for but still annoyed

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on April 6, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Good variety of colors, great for schools
reviews.reviewText: These headphones work well, nothing amazing but perfectly well for videos or music. Good variety of colors are included and they're comfortable. If they're handled roughly they will break (usually at one of the hinges), but they're not particularly weak. They are a little big for my 6 year old daughter, so I'd say they're better for bigger kids or even some adults. Perfect for teachers or parents needing bulk headphones for a classroom.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 28, 2022
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Family of seven find these useful
reviews.reviewText: The media could not be loaded. Value pack of 10 comfortable headphones for under $100 is a great investment. Currently when I had ordered these, the price point was around $5 per headphone. My family works from home and goes to school from home and though we may have designated areas in our space to work from, we appreciated the headphones giving us a tuned in and focused listening. It helps to reduce the background sounds while giving the listener the ability to have fine crisp audio. They are comfortable for my family members from age 7 to adult. I like that these are foldable as well to place in my desk. I also appreciate that they are color coded so that the family members or if you have students will not get their headphones mixed up. We even suggested placing a vinyl sticker or using a sharpie to draw on the side of the headphone to identify their very own. These do not have a microphone capability this is for listening purposes only. I also use this for meditation purposes and to watch my shows by not interrupting the people beside me. I'm very pleased with the function, comfort, and price point. Great for remote work or listening to your favorite audio without disturbing others.
